title: Beyond the Book Club, An Artist’s To-Do List
description: In a Queens Museum show that is by turns serious and bitingly funny, Xaviera Simmons challenges individuals and museums to show their commitment to justice.
dc:creator: Aruna D’Souza
media:credit: Jasmine Clarke for The New York Times
media:description: Detail from “Align” (2022), the centerpiece of Xaviera Simmons’s exhibition. The text is written from the point of view of the white subject, signifying the kind of thinking and action that the fight for social justice requires.
